extension.name: FavImageHover
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description: Responsive FavImageHover Joomla!3 Module

field.name: uploadImage
field.label: Upload Image
field.description: Upload the image for the module

field.name: moduleBorderRadius
field.label: Module Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the paragraph. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: imageAlt
field.label: Image Alt Text
field.description: Insert text for image Alt

field.name: titleText
field.label: Title Text
field.description: Insert text for title of the module

field.name: titleColor
field.label: Title Color
field.description: The color for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: titleBgColor
field.label: Title Background Color
field.description: The color for the background for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: titleIcon
field.label: Title Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow.

field.name: titleIconFontSize
field.label: Title Icon Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon of the title. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: titleIconVerticalAlign
field.label: Title Icon Vertical Align
field.description: Set the vertical align for the icon of the title of the module

field.name: titlePadding
field.label: Title Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the title of the module. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14)

field.name: titleFontSize
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the title of the module. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: titleLineHeight
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Set the line height for the title of the module

field.name: titleTextAlign
field.label: Title Text Align
field.description: Set the text align for the title of the module

field.name: hoverImageBgColor
field.label: Image Hover Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the image hover. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: imageText
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
field.label: Text
field.description: Text for the image hover

field.name: imageTextColor
field.label: Text Color
field.description: The color for the text of the image hover. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: imageTextFontSize
field.label: Text Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the text of the image hover

field.name: imageTextLineHeight
field.label: Text Line Height
field.description: Set the line height for the text of the image hover. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em(for example: 14px, not 14)

field.name: imageTextAlign
field.label: Text Align
field.description: Set the text align for the text of the image hover

field.name: readmoreText
field.label: Read More Text
field.description: Read More text to be displayed on the hover box, below the content

field.name: readmoreLink
field.label: Read More Link
field.description: Read More link to be displayed on the hover box, below the content

field.name: readmoreTarget
field.label: Read More Target
field.description: Select the target of the URL

field.name: readmoreColor
field.label: Read More Color
field.description: The color for the Read More link. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmoreBgColor
field.label: Read More Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the Read More link. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmoreIcon
field.label: Read More Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow.

field.name: readmoreIconFontSize
field.label: Icon Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon of the Read More link. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: readmoreBorderRadius
field.label: Read More Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the Read More link. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: readmorePadding
field.label: Read More Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the read more text inside the Read More link. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14)

field.name: readmoreMargin
field.label: Read More Margin
field.description: Set the margin for the Read More text inside the image hover. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14)
